Projects As a seasoned Graphic Designer with a focus on webpage design, I specialize in creating visually compelling and user-friendly digital experiences. With a deep understanding of design principles and a passion for aesthetics, I bring concepts to life, ensuring that every webpage I design not only looks great but also functions seamlessly.

ClientGREE PhilippinesServicesVideography & Photography, Video Editing, Digital Content, Planning, Video Director, WardrobeTechnologiesAfter Effects, Photoshop 				 			 			 				 				 				GREE Philippines got Alex Gonzaga, a Philippines’ known actress, as its first ambassador on year 2022. The project is to make an advertising campaign with GREE ambassador through out the year in every media and platforms.1. Create a static layout with and without GREE products together with the ambassador.2. Create short video of introductory of the new ambassador.3. Create different kinds of advertising materials (Catalogues, Flyers, etc.) that will be given to end users as well as dealers nationwide.4. Create BTS (Behind the scene) video for product launching event together with introduction of the new ambassador. What was the goal of the project? The scope of this project are planning of settings on the photography that will be using for static advertisement; second is how model poses on every scene on each settings. Wardrobe is also part of my execution, where the color theme falls to the GREE standard color which is royal blue. By combining these three, it concluded as a great plan. It also falls to my job as the final Quality Check on each shoot that been taken. Furthermore, videographer is one of my major job here and also being the director of videography. Every scenes, locations, settings, wardrobe were all in my decisions. In conclusion, this project had made a static advertisements for GREE Philippines company and also video for social media purposes.
This is the actual photo of the Showroom.

header: Nice to meet you,I'm Kart Fronda
body: Create awesome websites on your computer! No code & free. Publish anywhere. 9 					 						Years of experience 150 					Successful projects

How I started as a graphic artist & web developer First I were a anime fan and an artist of anime. That inspired me to become a graphic artist. I learned to used photoshop as my first app to create digital arts. The school which I had attended taught us about basic web language (HTML). That day my mind was astound by making codes. I did practicing everyday and every time on HTML languages and as well creating digital arts on photoshop. And without knowing, it became my hobby. As I graduated from my college, I pursue my hobby to become a job. And that's how I became of who I am today. My story My first designback in 2015 Way back 2015, I designed a packaging box for Nestle KitKat for their special event called "Meeting of the Minds". This project had been started from nothing which means I'm the one who designed the graphics as well. The client also wants to include the attendee's name so the production of the box would be layout multiple times on canvas that ready for printing.I also designed here the cutting marks for the machine and also the fold marks as you can see in this photo. Later on the client decided not just only the name would be printed but also their pictures. It was time consuming project but it was fun and excited as it was my first project for a big client.
Over 9 years of experience and 100+ projects

Digital Graphics Design Video Editing Photographer Videographer Web Developer 3D Interior Design  Achievements Employee of the Year 2019 Most Innovative Employee of the Year 2019 Guest Speaker: "Learning Robotics using Arduino 1 & 2" Top Clients GREE Philippines San Miguel Corp. Nestle DHL Seiko Q Power Station

For editing graphics media and better sizing for large scale format. OBS Streaming Tool 								 									Best used for having a LIVE virtual event. Supports any social media platforms. 								 							 							 						 					 						 							 								 									 								 							 							 								Sound Pad 								 									Best used for on hand sound effects for LIVE events. 								 							 							 						 					 						 							 								 									 								 							 							 								Davinci Resolve 								Recommend for color grading videos. This is the best for color manipulation for videos and clips. 								 							 							 						 					 						 							 								 									 								 							 							 								Cinema 4D 								 									Best for modeling and 3D animated videos. Together with After Effects they can create fascinating videos. Projects PhilConstruct Manila is the much more awaited exhibit event for all construction companies including technologies and industries. GREE PH joined the event for the 4th time and still continued to participate the said event this year 2024.

ClientGREE PhilippinesServices72 sqm 3-way Booth design & layoutTechnologiesSketch Up, D5 Render, After Effects, Photoshop, Illustrator 				 			 			 				 				 				GREE Philippines, as its 4th time, joined the much awaited exhibit events for industries which is PhilConstruct Manila 2024.In this event, GREE competitors are also participated and have their own booth.By this, GREE PH always joining as exclusive exhibitor with having a 72sqm area booth. And this is how I got involved in this project. What was the goal of the project? The goal of the project was to create a 72sqm booth that can maximize the showcasing of new GREE AC units residential & commercial AC.
Creating a huge booth with lots of units to be showcase is not easy. As every spaces and area are needed to be save to be able for sales and team and visitors look around the booth and the AC units.
This is the actual photo of the Showroom.
Go to my projects here

Projects Team Payaman Fair was a event for all influencers, content creators and artists here in the Philippines. GREE PH decided to join this event for a chance to have brand recall and advertisement.

ClientGREE PhilippinesServices18 sqm Island Booth design and layoutTechnologiesSketch up, D5 Render, After Effects, Photoshop, Illustrator 				 			 			 				 				 				GREE Philippines excited to join the prestigious event for influencers. By this, GREE PH became one of its Platinum sponsor for this event. By that, the event needs to have GREE PH their own booth for a chance to have big advertisement not only on social media platforms but also on the visitors of the events.  What was the goal of the project? The goal of this project is to create a 18 sqm Island type booth for GREE PH entry for platinum sponsor.With that, showcasing the most advance and new GREE AC units are been decided to include here at the booth.

This booth was redesign which is actually from the PhilConstruct Manila 2024 booth that been used. This is the small version of it. By that, using only reused parts on the existing booth and everything are all fabricated again including the lighted signages, etc.
This is the actual photo of the Showroom.
Go to my projects here

header: Project: GREE X Team Payaman Fair 2024
body: Scroll Indicator - Progress bar Click the "gear" icon to change the layout of the social bar. This text will be removed on preview/publish.

Projects This project was requested by GREE PH dealer which is one of the top sales dealer. This is one of the biggest showroom requested from me to be designed. The area of the showroom was difficult at first but in the end up perfectly place everything right.

ClientGREE PhilippinesServicesShowroom layout and designwith materials and detailed executionTechnologiesSketch Up, D5 Render, Photoshop, Illustrator 				 			 			 				 				 				GREE Philippines have many dealers around the country and least of them only have showrooms for showcasing GREE Air Conditioners. 1. Create a showroom design for one of the GREE PH Dealer.2. Insert the AC Units that can help the dealer showcase the new GREE AC Units that will also included for the Showroom layout. What was the goal of the project? The goal of this project is to make not only a showroom but to make unique kind of GREE AC showroom that will stand up from another showroom I had designed on the last time.New models of AC units also included to be showcase here in this project. By that, the design of the showroom here that I have made was luxury theme to be able the new AC Units have better way of showcasing it.

First, knowing what GREE AC units will be inserted here at this project. By that I can determine what amount of spaces and distances I have accumulate to start having a showroom design.Second, having known the status and size of the area which the showroom will be build.Lastly, the layout and designing of showroom will take place. In this project, the area of the showroom allotted to client was an L shape corner area which is much more appropriate for a walk-in showroom. By this visitors can see right through at ease at the display units.I decided to have cove lighting effects on each racks and put a detailed background on the background which was an embossed PVC panel. Every corner have each cove lightings effect that can easily showcase the AC units in front of it.
This is the actual photo of the Showroom.
Go to my projects here
